original_text: Then Jesus said, ‘When other people do wrong things against you, you must forgive them. Then God, your Father in heaven, will also forgive you for the wrong things that you have done.
korean_text: 너희가 사람의 잘못을 용서하면 너희 하늘 아버지께서도 너희 잘못을 용서하시려니와

sentences.original_text: When other people do wrong things against you
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 당신에게 잘못된 행동을 할 때

sentences.original_text: Then God, your Father in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하늘에 계신 당신의 아버지 하나님께서

sentences.original_text: for the wrong things that you have done
